io.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx

Class WebSocket13FrameEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder<WebSocketFrame>
        • io.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx.WebSocket08FrameEncoder
          • io.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx.WebSocket13FrameEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, WebSocketFrameEncoder

    public class WebSocket13FrameEncoder
extends WebSocket08FrameEncoder

    Encodes a web socket frame into wire protocol version 13 format. V13 is essentially the same as V8.

        public WebSocket13FrameEncoder(boolean maskPayload)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        maskPayload - Web socket clients must set this to true to mask payload. Server implementations must set this to false.
